page.title: 07CLUBS, RHYL
page.content: In Rhyl there are many clubs. There is a Judo Club every Monday from 6.30 to 9.30 p.m. Karate is also held at the Sports Centre on Sundays and they are taught Shotokan style. Karate is also taught in "The Studio" every night except Monday and Thursday. In the summer and winter there are 5-a- side football contests where schools and youth organisations play. The Golf Course has a club and a professionals' shop where you can buy golfing accessories. You can pay a green fee to play on the course. In the Evening League there are 10 cricket teams. The Robins, founded by Albert Robins in 1957, play Sunday matches all over North Wales. All cricket is played in the Coronation Gardens where a new pavilion has been opened recently.
